keyword: how many calories are in a mini cucumber
title: How Many Calories Are in a Mini Cucumber?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a mini cucumber, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and other nutrients on a per-unit basis with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Mini Cucumber?
assumptions: Average mini cucumber (Persian-style, ~75 g), raw, unpeeled, no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, freshness, and preparation; check labels or scales for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A mini cucumber contains about 12 kcal and provides hydration with minimal macros.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a mini cucumber?
faqs.a: Approximately 12 kcal for one average mini cucumber (~75 g).

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a mini cucumber?
faqs.a: About 2.7 g total carbs, including 0.7 g fiber and 1.3 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a mini cucumber low in protein or fat?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”only 0.5 g protein and 0.1 g fat, making it very low-calorie.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in mini cucumbers?
faqs.a: Smaller ones (~50 g) have ~8 kcal; larger (~100 g) up to 16 kcal.

faqs.q: Are mini cucumbers good for sodium intake?
faqs.a: Very low at 2 mg; pickling increases sodium significantly.
